Container.Name: OpenClaw-Unraid-CUDA
Container.Overview:
OpenClaw gateway image optimized for Unraid with pinned CUDA runtime libraries in-image (no runtime installers).
Security defaults: bridge networking, non-root container user, no NET_ADMIN, no in-container Tailscale daemon.
Remote access model: use bridge networking with Unraid host Tailscale integration. Do not run tailscaled in this container.
Control UI requires a secure browser context. Use HTTPS (recommended through host Tailscale/FQDN) or localhost tunneling. Example with Tailscale integration: https://YOUR-CONTAINER-HOSTNAME.YOUR-TAILNET.ts.net/?token=YOUR-GATEWAY-TOKEN When Tailscale integration is enabled, Unraid overrides entrypoint and requires root privileges for the hook. This image starts root and drops to node for OpenClaw runtime.
Before first run, set OPENCLAW_GATEWAY_TOKEN and at least one model provider API key.
Container.Requires: Unraid NVIDIA Driver Plugin (when GPU acceleration is desired)

Config.Name: Control UI Port
Config.Description: Gateway and Control UI host port mapped to container port 18789

Config.Name: OpenClaw Config
Config.Description: Persistent OpenClaw configuration and session data

Config.Name: OpenClaw Workspace
Config.Description: Workspace for files, memory, and projects managed by OpenClaw

Config.Name: Gateway Token
Config.Description: Required authentication token for UI/API access. Example: openssl rand -hex 24

Config.Name: Gateway Bind Mode
Config.Description: Gateway bind mode (lan, loopback, tailnet, auto, custom)

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Container timezone. Do not leave blank. Example: America/New_York

Config.Name: NVIDIA Visible Devices
Config.Description: GPU visibility. Set to specific IDs if needed.

Config.Name: PUID (Advanced)
Config.Description: UID used for one-time permission alignment workflows on Unraid. Only applies if container is started as root.

Config.Name: PGID (Advanced)
Config.Description: GID used for one-time permission alignment workflows on Unraid. Only applies if container is started as root.

Config.Name: Chown on Start (Advanced)
Config.Description: auto fixes ownership only when needed (recommended). Use true to force every start, false to disable.

Config.Name: Homebrew Path (Advanced)
Config.Description: Optional Homebrew persistence for advanced skill dependencies
